Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

HSEQUENCE

The basic type HSEQUENCE is a handle to an XMIDI sequence.

Discussion

HSEQUENCE handles are returned from the AIL_allocate_sequence_handle function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AILBEATCB, AILEVENTCB, AILPREFIXCB, AILSEQUENCECB, AILTRIGGERCB, AIL_allocate_sequence_handle, AIL_branch_index, AIL_channel_notes, AIL_controller_value, AIL_end_sequence, AIL_init_sequence, AIL_map_sequence_channel, AIL_register_ICA_array, AIL_register_prefix_callback, AIL_register_sequence_callback, AIL_register_trigger_callback, AIL_release_sequence_handle, AIL_resume_sequence, AIL_send_channel_voice_message, AIL_sequence_loop_count, AIL_sequence_ms_position, AIL_sequence_position, AIL_sequence_status, AIL_sequence_tempo, AIL_sequence_user_data, AIL_sequence_volume, AIL_set_sequence_loop_count, AIL_set_sequence_ms_position, AIL_set_sequence_tempo, AIL_set_sequence_user_data, AIL_set_sequence_volume, AIL_start_sequence, AIL_stop_sequence, AIL_true_sequence_channel
